clobber.name: clobber
clobber.description: hard resets to HEAD of origin and cleans the local repo

steps.say: ready to rock! (unpushed commits are under the "scratch" branch)

compat.name: compat
compat.description: Perform API compatibility check against latest version

steps.exec:
jsii-diff npm:$(node -p "require('./package.json').name") -k --ignore-file .compatignore || (echo "
UNEXPECTED BREAKING CHANGES: add keys such as 'removed:constructs.Node.of' to .compatignore to skip.
" && exit 1)
